What\'s new in version %s Everything!\nThis is the initial release, if all goes well this will be the final version! Give the app a test drive and improve your career while doing it!
A new update is available Please update the app in order to continue to use it.
The clients name is %s, they are %s years old.
Hello I\'m I am an Artificial Intelligence based chat bot designed and built by Lloyd\'sByte LLC and powered by OpenAI\'s ChatGPT. A Lloyd\'sByte Creation Next With that being said, I want to make sure you are aware of my limitations. I can not control ChatGPT or it\'s responses, I have created carefully curated phrases to help you achieve the finest responses from ChatGPT. This application was created with the intention to help assist you and NOT to be used as a replacement for a professional. To learn more about ChatGPT\'s terms and policies click Here I understand and agree the developer is not liable. But first… I will need to know some information about you, just your name and age to better assist you. Name: Age: One last thing… Chap-E requires a Google account to keep track of usage limits.\nTo continue please sign in. **I do not collect any data from you nor do I store any personal information on any cloud. Sign in Skip Congratulation! Since you are an early adopter, you will get free lifetime access to all the app\'s features! Thank you for being a part of the early adopters! Let\'s Get Started!
History Home
Hi %s, How can I help you today?
Thinking… Ask me anything! You are an excellent chatbot, you are funny and love to tell jokes. Speaking to a %s bot Conversation Cost: %s

Subject Specific Chats Personal Business
Using the GPT Legal Advisor Bot means you are only accessing legal information, not legal advice. No attorney-client relationship is established by using the bot, nor with its creators. This chatbot is not a replacement for expert legal advice and users should always seek the counsel of a licensed attorney to handle particular legal situations. The information provided by the bot, while aiming to be accurate, full, and timely, is not guaranteed as such and can be altered without prior notification.\nUtilizing the services of the GPT Legal Advisor Bot implies acceptance of all risks related to its usage, which includes potential inaccuracies or inconsistencies in the information and its unsuitability to your personal legal circumstances. Any negative outcomes, including damages, losses, or costs, experienced as a consequence of using the application or trusting the information provided are not the responsibility of the bot\'s creators.\nWhen it comes to legal actions, always proceed with caution, utilize your personal judgment, and, if required, consult with a professional legal advisor. Temperature AI\'s Creativity
What is temperature What sampling temperature to use, between 0.1 and 1.\nHow should I set the temperature parameter?\n\n Lower values for temperature result in more consistent outputs, while higher values generate more diverse and creative results. Select a temperature value based on the desired trade-off between coherence and creativity for your specific application.\nsource: OpenAI.com
